content.question: The changes shown in the table were most directly the result of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The growth in population after the Second World War known as the baby boom
The creation of the Iron Curtain separating Eastern and Western Europe during the Cold War
The effects of the Second World War on the Bulgarian economy
The growth in mass production and industrial efficiency across Europe in the late twentieth century

content.answer: The growth in mass production and industrial efficiency across Europe in the late twentieth century

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
